Term Assurance Plan is designed for the policyholder toenjoy receiving a cost effective benefits. Under this Plan, the sum assured will be paid in case of any unforeseen death during the term of the policy. This could be extended with the following living benefits that can be added separately, depending on the need of the policyholder

Accidental Death Benefit,Total & Permanent Disability Benefit,Partial & Permanent Disability Benefit,Critical Illness Benefit,Funeral Expenses Benefit,Family Income Benefit,Spouse Cover Benefit,Critical Illness Benefit on the Life of Spouse,Child Critical Illness Benefit,Waiver of Premium Benefit,Hospitalization per Day Benefit,Health Care Benefit,Super Health Care Benefit Are some Benifits

Endowment Plan offers living benefit as well as death benefit where the sum assured is increased by 2.5% every year to accommodate inflation. Although the sum assured increased, the original premium will remain the same.

Accidental Death Benefit, Total & Permanent Disability Benefit, Partial & Permanent Disability Benefit, Critical Illness Benefit, Funeral Expenses Benefit, Family Income Benefit, Spouse Cover Benefit, Critical Illness Benefit on the Life of Spouse, Child Critical Illness Benefit, Waiver of Premium Benefit, Hospitalization per Day Benefit, Health Care Benefit,

Retirement Plan is designed to enjoy the monthly pension while protecting the dependents of the policy holder. Monthly pension will be paid for a fixed period of 10 , 15 or 20 years as decided by the customer.For an untimely death taking place during the premium payment period death benefit will be paid to the nominee. Also on death or total permanent disability of the policy holder company will pay the future premium on behalf of the policyholder till the end of the premium paying term and retirement benefits will be paid from the retirement date as selected from the nominee
Critical Illness Benefit, Hospitalization per Day Benefit, Health Care Benefit, Super Health Care Benefit are the benifits

Investment Plan is designed to protect the policyholder while enjoying the attractive returns as a Living Benefit. The rate of return is decided on every year.In the event of Death of the policy holder basic Sum Assured or the Customers fund balance whichever is high will be payable, The policyholder can decide the frequency of premium payments. (i.e. monthly, quarterly, biannually or annually). Additionally, the following Living Benefits can be attached to this Plan;

Accidental Death Benefit, Total & Permanent Disability Benefit, Partial & Permanent Disability Benefit, Critical Illness Benefit, Additional Term Protection Benefit, Funeral Expenses Benefit, Family Income Benefit, Spouse Cover Benefit, Waiver of Premium Benefit, Hospitalization per Day Benefit, Health Care Benefit, Super Health Care Benefit

Super Investment Plan is designed to protect the policyholder while enjoying the attractive returns as a Living Benefit. The rate of return is decided on every year.In the event of Death of the policy holder basic Sum Assured or the Customers fund balance whichever is high will be payable, The policyholder can decide the frequency of premium payments. (i.e. monthly, quarterly, biannually or annually). Additionally, the following Living Benefits can be attached to this Plan;

Accidental Death Benefit, Total & Permanent Disability Benefit, Partial & Permanent Disability Benefit, Critical Illness Benefit, Additional Term Protection Benefit, Funeral Expenses Benefit, Family Income Benefit, Spouse Cover Benefit, Waiver of Premium Benefit, Hospitalization per Day Benefit, Health Care Benefit, Super Health Care Benefit

patterns: What Is the School Fees Plan
responses: Schools fees plan is designed to to parents who are working on risky jobs and the benifits cover a full lift time school fees of the child

Investment Plus Plan is designed to allow the policyholder for greater investment benefits by providing attractive returns as a living benefit. The rate of return is decided on every year and the frequency of premium payments could be decided by the policyholder as monthly, quarterly, half yearly, annually or single. The return on investment could be utilized for future investments, higher education, business purposes, or dowry of a child.

Arpico Relief plan is designed to meet the protection needs if you and your loved ones which will relieve you from the conventional premium payments while providing the benefits throughout the original term of the policy.;

Accidental Death Benefit, Total & Permanent Disability Benefit, Partial & Permanent Disability Benefit, Additional term protection benefit, Critical Illness Benefit, Funeral Expenses Benefit, Family Income Benefit, Hospitalization per Day Benefit, Health Care Benefit, Super Health Care Benefit, Waiver of premium benefit, Spouse cover benefit

Arpico Trust plan is designed to meet the protection needs if you and your loved ones which will relieve you from the conventional One time payment, while providing the benefits throughout the original term of the policy.;

Accidental Death Benefit, Total & Permanent Disability Benefit, Partial & Permanent Disability Benefit, Additional term protection benefit, Critical Illness Benefit, Funeral Expenses Benefit, Family Income Benefit, Hospitalization per Day Benefit, Health Care Benefit, Super Health Care Benefit, Waiver of premium benefit, Spouse cover benefit
